scenario: Adobe is recognized for its market-leading creative tools and is capitalizing on strong demand for its AI capabilities, such as text-to-image generation and generative fill. The stock has been volatile, down about 35% from its 52-week high, but the company's fundamentals remain solid, with record fiscal 2024 results showing 11% revenue growth and 15% higher adjusted earnings per share (EPS). Wall Street analysts project continued financial momentum in 2025, making this recent share-price weakness an attractive entry point for investors seeking exposure to this AI leader. Adobe's AI capabilities, such as Adobe Firefly, are expected to drive long-term growth.
